data.Name: Melissa Orr
data.staff_bio: Melissa Orr is a placement specialist in the Partnerships for Employment project. She received her B.A. in Psychology from Boston University in May 1999 and will be attending the School Psychology graduate program at UMass Boston starting in the fall of 2003. Melissa previously provided case management and job placement services at Morgan Memorial Goodwill Industries in Boston. She also worked as a mental health and addictions counselor for two years at Arbour-HRI Hospital in Brookline. Melissa currently provides placement services for individuals living in low-income housing with various disabilities find employment.
